abstract: Presenting the winning entries for the 2013 'Screen It' competition.
description: 'Screen It' is ACMI's nation-wide annual competition for Primary and Secondary School students. In 2013, the theme of "connect" drew entries from every state and territory in Australia. The entries in this compilation are the winners in each category, encompassing the best in live action, animation and videogames, best overall entries and the winners of the 'Bullying. No Way!' prize.
